thread.title: The Best Celebrity Instagrams and Snapchats From Super Bowl 2017
thread.title_full: The Best Celebrity Instagrams and Snapchats From Super Bowl 2017

title: The Best Celebrity Instagrams and Snapchats From Super Bowl 2017
text:
The Best Celebrity Instagrams and Snapchats From Super Bowl 2017 By Facebook PHOTO: Instagram 
The Super Bowl attracts more than just sports fanatics: Each year, celebrities flock to wherever the big game is taking place to get their football on. And this year's game was no exception. The 2017 Super Bowl was stacked with celebrity guests—most notably halftime performer Lady Gaga . Even better, some celebrities opted to watched the Super Bowl (or, in Amy Schumer's case, the Puppy Bowl) from the comfort of their own homes. (Why leave your couch?) Because we live in the era of informing the world every time we burp, many A-listers documented their Super Bowl adventures on social media channels, like Instagram and Snapchat. Thank God, to be honest: In my opinion, watching celebrities watch football is infinitely more entertaining than watching actual football. The celebrity Instagrams and Snapchats from the Super Bowl that we included below are particularly wonderful. 
(We'll keep updating with more as they come in!) 
Gisele Bündchen. "Daddy's little girl," Bündchen wrote. I cannot handle the cuteness. Loading
